english: We have to hurry up and bring down that fort.

text: İsodora kaleye girmemiz için ne varsa çizip verdi bize
english: Isodora drew and gave us everything to get into the castle.
How do we get into the castle with the pits?

text: dehlizlerin kalede nereye çıktığına kadar her şeyi biliyoruz
english: We know everything until we know where the holes are in the castle.

text: En önemlisi içeride sen olacaksın Ömer
english: Most importantly, you'll be inside, Omar.
Don't worry, sir.
Eat, my son. Eat.
Ana, if I eat any more, I'll explode.

text: Oğlum, seni aylardır suyla besledik Ye ki biraz et tutasın. Ye. Hadi
english: Son, we've been feeding you water for months so you can keep some meat.

text: Oh, anasının Alpi olacakmış Aslanım benim
english: Oh, your mother's gonna be Alpi, my lion.

text: Baba iznin olursa yeni obayı gezmek isterim
english: Dad, if you're allowed, I'd like to see the new room.

text: Peki oğlum, git gez Hem yediklerini biraz eritirsin
english: All right, son, go for a ride and melt what you're eating.
Thanks, Dad.

text: Dündar, sen yine de fazla koşturma da yediklerin erimesin tamam mı?
english: Dündar, don't make it too much so your food doesn't melt, okay?
Son, did you hear me?
Yes, ma'am.

text: Beyim, Selcan'ı ne yapacağız? Gündoğdu, çık git çadırımdan demiş
english: Sir, what are we going to do about Selcan?
What did you say?

text: Oğul, babana da bana da biraz zaman ver içimize sindirelim dedim
english: Son, I said give your father some time and me some time to digest.
What do you think?

text: Ne diyeceğimi, ne yapacağımı bilemiyorum Hayme
english: I don't know what to say or what to do Hayme
Have we been feeding a traitor for years?

text: yoksa hayırlı bir evlada mı sahip olduk bilemedim
english: I don't know if we've had a good son.

text: İbnül Arabi olmasaydı otağımda öldürürdüm onu
english: If it wasn't for Ibn Arabi, I'd have killed him in my tent.
I'm not that merciful.

text: Belki de Turgut'un da Dündar'ında başına gelenlerin arkasında hep o vardı
english: Maybe he was the one behind what happened to Turgut in Dündar.
The sun has risen, and my son has fallen.
The kid doesn't know what to do.
Hold on, it's for the best.
You rest, sir.

text: Ben sizi en iyi şekilde temsil edeceğim
english: I'll represent you as best I can.

text: Evet Titus, sen ne diyorsun bu olan biten şeylere?
english: So, Titus, what do you think of all this?

text: Kayıları geldikleri yere göç ettirmeye çalışmak büyük hataydı
english: Trying to move the apricots back where they came from was a mistake.
We should have killed them the first chance we got.

text: Senin bir teklifin var mı Şövalye Titus?
english: Do you have an offer, Knight Titus?
Yes, I do.

text: Kayılar kendi kanlarında boğulmadan hiçbirimiz rahat yüzü görmeyiz
english: None of us will be able to rest until the apricots drown in their own blood.

text: Beşikteki bebeklerine kadar hepsi ölecek ki…
english: They're all gonna die until their baby's in the crib.
May our holy cause be brought to life.

text: Peki, Kardinal Thomas ne diyor bu işe?
english: And what does Cardinal Thomas say?

text: Bu gece odasında sizleri ağırlayıp konuşmak ister…
english: He'd like to have you in his room tonight and talk...
...if you don't mind.

text: Doğan, Deli Demir’e söyleyin otağa gelsin hemen
english: Doğan, tell Mad Demir to come to the tent immediately
Yes, sir.
Giddyup!
Have you heard from Omar?
Yes, sir.
What's up?
The news is not good, my lord.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im seni otağa çağırdı Deli Demir
english: Mr. Ertuğrul has called you to the tent Mad Demir
What's the good of it?
Not really, Mad Iron.
Is my brother better, Aygirl?
My dear friend Petruccio

text: o ne büyük o ne kutsal bir adamdır
english: What a great man he is, what a holy man he is.

text: Ama Haçlı Seferlerinin onun gibi ölüm döşeğinde bir kahramana değil…
english: But not a hero on the deathbed of a Crusade like him...

text: …hepimize güç verecek, genç ve hayat dolu bir kahramana ihtiyaç duyuyor
english: ...will give us all strength, a young and full of life.

text: Bu kahraman da Titus’un ta kendisidir
english: This hero is Titus.

text: Obamızın geleceği için o kale Haçlı keferelerinin başına yıkılmalıdır beyim
english: For the sake of our Oba's future, that castle must fall upon the Crusades, my lord.
There's no other way.

text: Kurdoğlu’nu kullanıp, geldiğimiz bu cennet topraklardan bizi sürmek isterler
english: They want to use Kurdoglu to drive us out of this paradise we came from.
Thank God they didn't make it.

text: Bundan gayrı tek amaçları soyumuzu kurutmak olacaktır
english: Other than that, their only goal is to wipe out our bloodline.
Crazy Iron?

text: Beyim, İsodora’nın getirdiği çizimlere fırsat buldukça göz attım
english: Sir, I took a look at the drawings that Isodora brought.

text: Böyle bir şey mümkündür Mümkündür lakin…
english: It's possible, but...

text: …o kapanmış delikleri açmak ne kadar sürer bilmem
english: I don't know how long it'll take to open those sealed holes.
If we're gonna do this...
...the people in the castle can't even hear it.
Is that possible, Ertugrul?

text: Kaleyi kuşatırsak imkânsızı mümkün kılarız beyim
english: If we surround the castle, we'll make the impossible possible, sir.
That's how they get out...

text: …ne de kendi gibi soysuzlara haber yollayabilirler
english: They can't send news to degenerates like themselves.

text: Kale kuşatma altındayken dehlizleri gizlice açıp kaleye girebiliriz
english: When the castle is under siege, we can sneak into the castle.

text: Şövalyelerimizin sayısı Kayıların Alpleri kadar çok değil
english: Our knights are not as numerous as the Alps of the Apricots.

text: Ani bir baskın elbette bize avantaj sağlayacaktır
english: A sudden raid, of course, will give us an advantage.
But I don't want to risk the war.
What do you suggest, Titus?

text: Antakya Haçlı Kontluğu’ndan bir birlik isteyeceğim
english: I'm going to ask the Count of Antioch for a unit.
This 800-man regiment of archers...

text: …bizim atlı ve yaya birliklerin işini kolaylaştıracaktır
english: ...will make it easier for our cavalry and foot soldiers.
I will ask Cyprus for about 300 knights
Where will you find ships, Titus?
They're ready, sir.

text: İmparator Friedrich’in gönderdiği on beş kadırganın…
english: The 15 galleys sent by Emperor Friedrich...

text: …Girne Limanı’nda beklediğini biliyorum Donanma komutanı gereğini yapacaktır
english: I know you're waiting at the port of Girne, and the commander of the Navy will do as he pleases.

text: Gemiler bir hafta içinde İskenderun’da olurlar
english: The ships will be in Alexander's place within a week.

text: Kalenin arka tarafları uçurumdur beyim Sadece ön tarafından girişi vardır
english: The back of the castle is a cliff, sir. Only the front entrance.

text: Dehlizlerine girişi sağ ve sol yanlardandır
english: And on the right hand and on the left hand.

text: Eğer kaleyi buradan ve buradan kuşatırsak…
english: If we surround the castle from here and here...
...there's a chance we can get in through the walls.

text: Bu kaleye girebilir miyiz Deli Demir?
english: Can we get into this castle, Crazy Iron?
Sir, you need to see the holes in place.

text: O vakit sen ve Afşin kaleye gidip bir göz atın

Yes, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Alpleri cenge hazır hâle getirelim

text: Onlar da bize saldırmak için hazırlanıyorlardır
english: They'll be preparing to attack us as well.
Let's strengthen the defense in the Obada.

text: Hem müdafaa hem taarruz hâlinde olalım dersiniz beyim
english: You'd think we'd be both defensive and aggressive, sir.

text: Gündoğdu sen de cenk için akçe bulmaya bak
english: It's daylight, and you'll find the white for the war.

text: Pusat için iaşe için akçeye ihtiyaç vardır
english: For pusat there is a need for whiteness.
With gold found in Kurdoglu and his lord's tents
We'll collect the necessary pusats, Dad.

text: Amacımız kendi altınlarıyla soylarını kurutmak olacaktır
english: Our goal will be to eradicate their offspring with their own gold.

text: Gazamız mübarek ola Artık savaş başlamıştır

text: Turgut Alp’in düğününden sonra harekete geçeceğiz

We had a great opportunity.

english: We should have killed him and his Alps when we caught them in the woods.
We could've gotten rid of them all.
But what did you do?

english: You missed this opportunity because of the thought of Ibn Al-Arabi (Arabi).

text: Ertuğrul ölseydi sen şimdi yaşıyor olacaktın
english: If Ertugrul were dead, you'd be alive now.
You'd be in charge of your position.
It's too late.

text: Şu içinde bile ne olduğunu bilmediğimiz sandık…
english: We thought we didn't even know what was in it...
...he's already destroyed us.
Just because of your stupidity

text: Cehenneme kadar yolun var Petruccio Manzini
english: Go to hell, Petruccio Manzini.
I've spoken to Ibn Al-Arabi, sir.

He asked me to come with him.
Will the chest be with you?
Yes, sir.
Good.
I'll go to Constantine with the little prince.
I'll meet you there.
Halima Sultan buried the chest here
Neither did I. I wanted you to know.
Thank you, son.
I knew my trust was in good hands.

english: I don't know what's in it.

text: Bizim sandık senin de Alplerinin de hayatını kurtardı evlat
english: Our Ark saved yours and the Alps's, son.

text: Titus bizi yakaladığında beni öldürmek istedi

Whatever's in it...

Gökçe!

text: Sen de babam gibi onurumuzu kirlettin

text: Bundan gayrı benden kimseye bir kötülük gelmeyecek

Yeaahh!
O Allah!
Welcome, crazy boy!
You're still a jerk, aren't you?

I hope we'll fight the enemy soon.

text: O Tapınakçılardan intikam almazsan gözüm açık gider bilesiniz

text: Ya senin akşama nikâhın var sen hâlâ burada bizimle tepişirsin ya

Get your hands on your face.

text: Sonra Aykız bacım seni görüp de ben ne ettim…
english: And then my little sister saw you and what did I do...
...don't tell me that's what I've been waiting for.

text: Ne anamla ne babamla konuşacak yüzüm yok kardeşim
english: I don't have the face to talk to my parents, brother.
They won't come and talk to me either.
I don't know what to do.

text: Selcan Hatun’u yalnız koyma abi Ne yapmışsa yapmıştır
english: Don't leave Selcan Hatun. He's done what he's done.

text: Belli ki pişmandır, doğru yolu arar
english: He's obviously sorry, looking for the right path
Ibn Al-Arabi showed him the way

text: Senin de desteğine ihtiyaç duyar Biraz daha vakit ver ona
english: He'll need your support. Give him more time.
Oh, brother...
You look beautiful, Moongirl.

text: Sağ olasınız kızlar Hepiniz muradınıza eresiniz
english: Thank you, girls. You're all going to be just fine.
You've been patient, you've finally had your happiness, Moongirl.

text: Sen de Ertuğrul Bey’ime kavuşacaksın Halime Sultan
english: You'll get yours, Mr. Ertuğrul. Halima Sultan.
Inshallah.

english: Is my helmet ready, Gökçe Hatun?
Ready, ready
Look.
Mashallah
I told you I'd give you a son.
I carry your child in my belly
Obaya is a brave Alps...
...I'll give a gentleman's son to the record.
You burned me, Selcan.
You burned me.
This letter is for the Earl of Antioch...
...this will go to Cyprus. Yes, sir.
Godspeed.

text: İbnül Arabi’nin sandığı umurumda bile değil
english: I don't give a damn what Arabi Ibn Albul thinks.

text: Sandıkla ilgili gelişmeleri Kardinal Hazretleri bana anlattı
english: His Eminence told me about the chest.
We're not rivals anymore.
To succeed in becoming a follower of Arabi...

text: …İslam dünyasıyla savaşımızda bize pek çok kapıyı açacaktır
english: ...will open many doors for us in our fight against the Islamic world.
Congratulations.

text: İsodora’nın çizdiği haritaya göre burası olması lazım
english: According to Isodora's map, this should be the place.
He said "over the water."
He drew what he heard from his father.

text: Eğer doğruysa burası köprünün altında bir yer
english: If it's true, this is a place under the bridge.

text: Yanlış yer olabilir mi diyorsun yani?
english: Are you saying it could be the wrong place?

text: O zaman Ertuğrul Bey’in tüm hesapları şaşar

text: Bu kadar keferenin olduğu yerde bir hinoğlu hinlik vardır
english: Where there are so many keferes, there's a hinoğlu hinlik

This is it.

english: Born, I have something to say Tell me brother

Heh, we all have our qualifications.
Huh?
Brother Turgut is like a lion's piece
Thanks.
I'm the swordman's pi...

What's your qualifications?
In the name of God!

text: Ya bir durun Dırdıra başlamayın yine

text: Bak, vallahi o Tapınakçıların zindanına geri dönerim ha
english: Look, I'll go back to that Templar's dungeon.

Don't look at this Dogan.
He can't face the truth. He's unqualified.

text: Buyur kardeş, börkün de burada Eyvallah
english: Here you go. Here's your pie. Thank you.

text: Aykız bacım senin gibi bir Alpi er eyledi ya…
english: My sister, Alpi Erdi, like you...
♪ may he rest ♪ ♪ may he pray ♪

english: You're so handsome, bro.
Thanks.
Brothers and sisters

We'll let him open it, Mr. Gündüz.
I'm worried about the traps inside.
If we don't secure our digs...
...the whole area could come down on us.

english: Can we lift a siege that will last for months, Ertugrul?

text: Eğer dışarıdan yardım gelmezse kaldırabiliriz beyim
english: If there's no outside help, sir, we can take it.
Are the Alps ready?
It's ready, brother.
Allah be with you.

text: O vakit, Turgut Alp’in düğününden sonra hareket ederiz

text: Haydi Deli Demir, sen de var Aykız’la vedalaş

Don't shed too many tears
Sir, we haven't had peace in a long time.

text: Çok şükür sayenizde artık o da var
english: Thank God he's here now.

text: Keşke anan yaşayaydı da bu günleri göreydi

My dear father
My life is devoted to you, my father.
May you exist
You raised me without a mother
Give me your blessing.
Way to go.
Way to go.
Look, girl...

And you don't feed your children.
Be faithful to your wife
Don't say a word to him.
You don't want to laugh at one thing.
You'll always be there for her.
Is there a sign?
Come on, boy.
Here you are, my son.

text: Bak evlat seni her daim oğlum bildim. Bilesin
english: Look, son, I've always known you as my son.
Don't upset my daughter.

text: Erliğini ona kaba kuvvetle göstermeye kalkmayasın

text: O sana önce yaratanın sonra da benim emanetimdir

Don't hurt the trust.

text: Bir ömür boyu emanetinizi incitmeyeceğim baba

I give you my word on the Alps.
So?
Today's our day. Let's go!
Come on.
Everyone will keep their hands open.
So he won't.
And he'll sing with me
